name: The Second Hand (IanTyf, tassneenbashir, Lorg, CGonza)
name_original: The Second Hand (IanTyf, tassneenbashir, Lorg, CGonza)
description:
The Second Hand is a puzzle adventure game about a ghost possessing clocks in his old clock shop that is being run by his niece now. The shop is on the verge of being sold, and the player gains powers to influence the decision.

Controls:

**Only supports xbox & switch controllers as of now**

Hold:

- LT/RT: rewind/fastforward time

- X (xbox) / Y (switch): stop current clock from ticking

Press: 

- LB/RB: ring clock

- Left joystick: select other clocks

- A (xbox) / B (switch): go to selected clock

- Y (xbox) / X (switch): tick current clock 1 minute forward

Designed and developed by

Ian Tang - Design, Programming, Tech Art (iantyf.itch.io)

Lorg An. - Design, Programming, Art (lorgoncewas.itch.io)

Tassneen Bashir - Design, Narrative, 3D Art (tassneenbashir.itch.io)

Camron Gonzalez - Design, Narrative, Puzzle Design (https://gamesbycam.carbonmade.com/https://cgonza.itch.io)
